definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to move one's lips/to wag one's tongue
erhua variant of 動嘴皮|动嘴皮[dong4 zui3 pi2]
see 動嘴皮|动嘴皮[dong4 zui3 pi2]

sentences.english: Hardly anyone has bothered to reply.
The more times you move your mouth.
Mind-reading devices could help people who cannot speak communicate.
sentences.chinese: 讀取思想的設備幫助人們無需動嘴就能實現彼此交流。

sentences.english: You must show your support by deeds, not words.
sentences.chinese: 你必須用行動支持，而不只是動動嘴。
